task_title: Need a plumber for a leaking pipe
task_description: I need a professional plumber to fix a leaking pipe in my kitchen. The task includes replacing the damaged pipe section.
task_requirements: Please bring your own tools and gloves.
task_image_video: URL or file path for images/videos related to the task (e.g., broken pipe image)
task_assigned_to: User ID of the worker or 'Not assigned'
special_instructions: Please wear safety gear and handle with care.

task_faq.question: Do you provide tools?
task_faq.answer: No, please bring your own tools.

task_reviews.review: Great plumber, fixed the leak in no time!

task_availability: Available weekdays between 9 AM to 5 PM
task_video_intro: URL of a short video explaining the task or showing the issue.
refund_policy: Refunds available within 7 days if not satisfied with the task.
task_terms_and_conditions: Task must be completed within the agreed time frame. No refunds after work is completed.
